name: Allied Nations
description: Allied Nations is an primarily online RPG/RTS akin to games such as Dwarf Fortress and the more modern RimWorld. You are able to easily manage units, wage war, build and roleplay. Through your own wit, might, or sheer luck can you survive this experience? Probably not but give it your best try!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD 4300+ or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or equivalent DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: AMD 8350+ or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space
